MLX C

MLX C#

MLX C is a C API for MLX.

MLX is an array framework for machine learning research on Apple silicon. MLX C expands MLX to the C language, making research and experimentation easier on Apple silicon. MLX is intended for research and not for production deployment of models in apps.

MLX C can be used standalone or as a bridge to bind other languages to MLX. For example, the MLX Swift package uses MLX C for Swift bindings to MLX.
